title: Spiritual Health | Interior Health
description: Get an overview of this service and learn how to access it. Find out what locations this service is offered at.
cleaned_text: The professional practice of spiritual health is the assessment, therapeutic relationship and interventions provided to help people with their spiritual growth, healing, and well-being. "Helping people draw upon their own cultural, spiritual and religious resources for wisdom, guidance, strength and healing as they journey through life stages." (Canadian Association for Spiritual Care). The health-care experience may raise questions around meaning and purpose in life and how to sustain faith and hope, especially when you're faced with illness or life-changing events. In such times it can be good to talk with a spiritual health professional who is clinically trained to support you spiritually and emotionally through your experience. Acute care sites supported by spiritual health professionals [Kelowna General](https://www.interiorhealth.ca/services/spiritual-health?lid=L190) [Royal Inland](https://www.interiorhealth.ca/services/spiritual-health?lid=L348)in Kamloops Acute care sites supported by spiritual health volunteers and visitors
